Touch one of the buttons on the left to take a picture after a 5, 15, or 30 second delay. There will be a series of audible beeps starting 3 seconds before the picture is taken. You can take a picture with no delay by touching the "Now" button.

The buttons on the right allow you to control camera options as follows:
1 Pic/4 Pics: Toggle between taking a single picture, or four in succession.
Flash: Cycle between automatic, on, and off flash settings. Available only on Android 2.1 or later.
Switch Camera: Switches between rear and front-facing cameras. Available only on devices with multiple cameras and Android 2.3 or later.

After taking a picture, it will be shown with options to delete it, view it in the gallery app, or return to the main screen. When taking 4 pictures, they will all be shown in a grid and you can view and delete individual pictures.

Pictures are saved on your SD card in the CamTimer directory.
